hero.description: Istanbul Online is your trusted technology partner in digital transformation. We develop web applications, mobile solutions, and enterprise software that drive business growth.

about.label: About Us
about.description: Istanbul Online Technology was founded in 2016. With our strong software and SEO team, we have successfully developed banausta.com and doktorlariniz.com web and mobile applications. Since 2026, we have expanded our operations to offer web and mobile application solutions to third parties.

items.text: Doctor.io made our clinic management incredibly easy. Istanbul Online team is professional and solution-oriented.
items.author: Dr. Ahmet Ozkan

items.text: They delivered our e-commerce project on time and within budget. They are also very fast in technical support.

items.text: Thanks to Bana Usta platform, our business doubled. They did an amazing job.
